Global Dataset on Higher Education Institutions
text: IAU WHED - World Higher Education Database, available https://whed.net/home.php

title: WHED Dataset — whed
text: dataset contains institution-level information higher education institutions around world.

title: WHED Dataset — whed
text: data frame 8887 rows 213 variables: name Name institution url Website URL institution country Country institution located id Unique identifier institution city City institution located name_detail Detailed name institution funding_type Type funding institution (e.g., public, private) languages Languages used institution accrediting_agency Accrediting agency institution year_founded Year institution founded academic_year Academic year details business_school Indicates institution business school degree_count Number degrees offered division_name_X Name division X division_fields_study_X Fields study division X degree_name_X Name degree X degree_fields_study_X Fields study degree X
